'''Version 2.3 Commemorative Lottery Event''' is a Web [[Event]] in [[Version 2.3]].

Hello, Travelers! [[Version 2.3]] "Shadows Amidst Snowstorms" is coming to an end on January 4, 2022, how do you feel about the content of this version?

To commemorate V2.3 "Shadows Amidst Snowstorms," we have specially prepared a lottery community event! Participate in the event and write down your well-wishes, and get the chance to win Primogems!

==Event Duration==
* Submission Period: December 28, 2021 – January 3, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8)
* Results: Announced on the official website on January 7, 2022

==How to Participate==
# Add the hashtag "#GenshinImpactLotteryEvent" and submit a GIF screenshot of the post and your wish to Twitter to participate.
# Add the hashtag "#GenshinImpactLotteryEvent" and submit a GIF screenshot of the post and your wish to your Facebook page to participate.
<nowiki>*</nowiki>Travelers participating in the event are required to make their account and tweets public

==Event Rewards==
* 100 participating Travelers will be selected to receive a prize of {{Item|Primogem|20|x=200}}.

==Note==
# Travelers must be Adventure Rank 10 or higher on the Europe, America, Asia, or TW/HK/MO servers.
# By participating in the event, you agree that miHoYo has the right to publicly display the entries.
# The evaluation will be carried out by the official organizers.
# Failure to submit the required information within one month after the results are announced officially will result in the forfeit of your prize.
# Please be aware that the event may be subject to change or termination.
# There are a total of 100 winners across all platforms. There is no amount of prizes set aside for each platform and region.
